item.title: Honda Accord Headliner Redo
item.description: Look at that beautiful 12 year old Honda Why The foam holding it in place to the headliner board deteriorated. I am too broke to buy a new liner… and the car is too old to make it perfect. Find a suitable headliner replacement fabric I live in Texas and its hot. Really hot. Without some insulation the heat from the sun would bake me inside my car. I have an old quilt with some sort of poly batting that I will use for the headliner.
